/* YjsCommCdMapper.yjsCommCdList */ SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_NM , COMM_DESC FROM TB_COMM_CD
AND COMM_CD LIKE '%' || #{commCd} || '%'
AND COMM_NM LIKE '%' || #{commNm} || '%'
AND COMM_DESC LIKE '%' || #{commDesc} || '%'
ORDER BY COMM_CD

/* YjsCommCdMapper.yjsCommDtList */ SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_DT_CD , COMM_DT_NM , COMM_DT_DESC , SORT_ORDER , COMM_DT_GRP FROM TB_COMM_DT
AND COMM_CD LIKE '%' || #{commCd} || '%'
AND COMM_DT_CD LIKE '%' || #{commDtCd} || '%'
AND COMM_DT_NM LIKE '%' || #{commDtNm} || '%'
AND COMM_DT_DESC LIKE '%' || #{commDtDesc} || '%'
AND COMM_DT_GRP LIKE '%' || #{commDtGrp} || '%'
